findings.title: Owner can change dividend tracker
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the dividend tracker which could lead to unintended behavior and potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change Uniswap router address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the Uniswap router address, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fees
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses from fees.

findings.title: Owner can blacklist addresses
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to blacklist addresses.

findings.title: Owner can change liquidity, marketing and ADA reward fees
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify critical parameters such as liquidity, marketing, and ADA reward fees without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner Can Exclude and Include Addresses in AutomatedMarketMakerPairs Array
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude and include addresses in the automatedMarketMakerPairs array, which can potentially lead to security issues.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from dividends
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude addresses from receiving dividends.

findings.title: Owner can change marketing wallet
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the marketing wallet.

findings.title: Owner can change gas for processing
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify gas for processing which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can update claimWait value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to update the claimWait value.

findings.title: Owner can change maxTxAmount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change maxWalletBalance
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum wallet balance, which could lead to unintended consequences.
